message.name: BOSS_PIRATE_DESCR
message.value: The Pirate Captain has sunken so many times, that he is not afraid of water anymore.

message.name: BOSS_ILLUSIONIST_DESCR
message.value: It's hard to kill the Illusionist, when you don't know which one of them is real.

message.name: BOSS_SHAMAN_DESCR
message.value: Shaman relies on pesky demons, which may teleport anywhere, if you attack them

message.name: BOSS_VIKING_DESCR
message.value: You're fighting against 3 veterans and your time leaks away.

message.name: BOSS_WIND_MASTER_DESCR
message.value: Wind is not an ally anymore - it serves the Wind Master!

message.name: BOSS_SAMURAI_CAT_DESCR
message.value: This cat really has 9 lives! This duel's going to be a test of your endurance.

message.name: BOSS_MINER_DESCR
message.value: Genius of explosions, which base is well protected by enhanced mines.

message.name: BOSS_ELDER_DEMONS_DESCR
message.value: This zombies were possesed by some powerful force. Are you prepared to meteor shower?

message.name: BOSS_SOUL_DESCR
message.value: The Spirit heals his carriers while trying to escape you. Don't give him a chance.

message.name: BOSS_GHOST_DESCR
message.value: Malicious creature, who managed to subdue the energy of lightning. You simply don't have a chance.

message.name: BOSS_YAKUZA_DESCR
message.value: The gang members are tightly linked to each other. By killing one of them, you make others stronger.

message.name: BOSS_ROMEO_JULIET_DESCR
message.value: One of the best mercenary teams. Noone has unraveled their secret yet.

message.name: BOSS_KING_DEAD_DESCR
message.value: You think you can handke the horde of zombies and King's black magic?

message.name: BOSS_DEAD_PIRATE_DESCR
message.value: The Old Pirate has returned with extra powers! Revenge!

message.name: BOSS_SERGEANT_DESCR
message.value: Sergeant is protected by the loyal guard and brand new invisible guarding bots!

message.name: BOSS_FARMER_DESCR
message.value: It's not known exactly, what is grown by this Farmer, but he must be interrupted.

message.name: BOSS_HUNTER_DESCR
message.value: The Hunter relies on his laser traps, which are impossible to escape from (as he thinks).

message.name: BOSS_MANIACS_DESCR
message.value: This creatures are skilled with their dreadful hooks - so keep the distance!

message.name: BOSS_GUARDIANS_DEPTHS_DESCR
message.value: The Earth itself fights for the Guardians! Don't even try to attack without a strong team!

message.name: BOSS_DARK_KNIGHT_DESCR
message.value: Superior warrior protected by twilight. He creates his own army of acolytes with the only aim to destroy you!

message.name: BOSS_ASSASSIN_DESCR
message.value: Master of knife combat and stealth movement. You have to find a way to escape his deadly attacks.

message.name: BOSS_ALCHEMIST_DESCR
message.value: Alchemist is extremely dangerous in combat but only if he has some reagents to use.

message.name: BOSS_ARCHBOT_DESCR
message.value: What can be worse than a robot, who practices magic? Protection from fire and lightning will surely help!

message.name: BOSS_EMPEROR_DESCR
message.value: All he commands now is a pile of terracotta soldiers. But don't think you can just come and claim his tresures.

message.name: BOSS_SCIENTIST_DESCR
message.value: Pretty soon you'll feel the power of science (and also of lightning and magnetism)!

message.name: BOSS_SYMBIOTE_DESCR
message.value: Thrash your friends to hurt your foe - that's the only way to overcome this lifeform!

message.name: BOSS_ENGINEER_DESCR
message.value: Inventor, who created a vault in ancient tomb. First wrong action will lead to your defeat!

message.name: BOSS_PALADIN_DESCR
message.value: Warrior of light, wielding powerful magic for both attack and defense. Still you have advantage in numbers.

message.name: BOSS_HACKER_DESCR
message.value: When engaged in combat, hacker relies on his protective field heavily. Seize control over generators and destroy him!

message.name: BOSS_THIEVES_DESCR
message.value: They'll strip you of your weapons in a nick of time. And then you'll have to fight them with few remaining guns.

message.name: BOSS_PSIONICS_DESCR
message.value: Telepathist creates black holes, instantly destroying your units. Only ally's reflexes can save you!

message.name: BOSS_PHANTOMS_DESCR
message.value: These ghosts cause panic just with their presence! Even if you overcome a fear, what about clones of yourself?

message.name: BOSS_ARCHDEMON_DESCR
message.value: Lord of the local hell. Don't surprise, when you find yourself trapped and bound, on this territory he is almighty.
